# Emergency Power Supply System Inspection and Maintenance - Correctional Services Canada (CSC)
===============

### Tender Information

| Header | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4141536778-Doc4141607622 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4141536778 |
| **Publication Date** | Wednesday, August 10, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | Tuesday, September 4, 2023 2:00 PM ET |
| **Amendment Date** | Friday, August 18, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | Tuesday, December 1, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | Monday, November 30, 2024 |

### Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is inviting tenders from qualified Offerors to provide Emergency Power Supply System Inspection & Maintenance services for Correctional Services Canada (CSC) at various locations in New Brunswick, Canada, and Nova Scotia, Canada.

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the Offeror who submits the best price, taking into account the quality of services.

### History of the Procurement Process

This procurement process is open to all qualified Offerors.

### Standards and Specifications

The Offeror must meet the following standards and specifications:

* Portable generator maintenance and/or repair service
* Portable generator rental service

### Notice History

This notice has been amended once on August 18, 2023.

### Contact Information

For further information and tender inquiries, please contact:

Kate Mintzer (elle-la / she-her)
PSPC/SPAC
416-512-5048
kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please see the tender notice for more details on the requirement.

### Notes

Inquiries regarding this tender must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for response. All inquiries related to the technical aspects of the tender should be addressed to the Contracting Authority.
